analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/10/0x8dfd6fa19312ad2c4bcfc24189c23c9b4c0c4f2a.sol:
	Contract BitGoals has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/10/0x8dfd6fa19312ad2c4bcfc24189c23c9b4c0c4f2a.sol#94)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/10/0x8dfd6fa19312ad2c4bcfc24189c23c9b4c0c4f2a.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.20 (/unique_chucks/10/0x8dfd6fa19312ad2c4bcfc24189c23c9b4c0c4f2a.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_spender' of BitGoals.increaseApproval (/unique_chucks/10/0x8dfd6fa19312ad2c4bcfc24189c23c9b4c0c4f2a.sol#189-190) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_addedValue' of BitGoals.increaseApproval (/unique_chucks/10/0x8dfd6fa19312ad2c4bcfc24189c23c9b4c0c4f2a.sol#190) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of BitGoals.decreaseApproval (/unique_chucks/10/0x8dfd6fa19312ad2c4bcfc24189c23c9b4c0c4f2a.sol#209-210) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_subtractedValue' of BitGoals.decreaseApproval (/unique_chucks/10/0x8dfd6fa19312ad2c4bcfc24189c23c9b4c0c4f2a.sol#210) is not in mixedCase
